summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2021 regarding a discovery request for the Jeffrey Epstein/Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The FBI Victim Services Division is requesting contact information for victims, witnesses, and their attorneys to comply with discovery obligations ahead of the scheduled trial.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject of the New York investigation, with a trial scheduled for November 29, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of the New York investigation alongside Jeffrey Epstein, with a trial scheduled for November 29, 2021.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects of the same New York criminal investigation (50D-NY-3027571) and are scheduled for trial together.

events.title: Scheduled Trial for Epstein/Maxwell
events.description: The New York investigation of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin trial.

events.title: Resources Provided to Victim Services
events.description: An FBI staff member provided resources via email to Victim Services on this date, as referenced in the email chain.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively gathering contact information for victims, witnesses, and their attorneys for discovery in the Epstein/Maxwell case as of September 2021.
The trial for the New York investigation (case number 50D-NY-3027571) was scheduled for November 29, 2021.
The discovery request included all communications (texts, emails, voicemails) with victims, witnesses, or their attorneys, indicating a broad scope of evidence collection.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination and urgency, with a deadline of COB Monday, September 13, 2021, to provide the requested information.
